body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? Run the deck strength calculator with for instance 100 games. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? This should have no influence on the player history.
However games played and won/lost also count the 100 simulated games. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.22
author: [ubeefx](https://code.google.com/u/ubeefx/)
title: Deck strength calculator changes player history

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 4748ada80885 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Thanks for spotting that bug.

I never thought of the deck strength calculator messing up history even though the panel is right above it :/
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

content:
_From [ubeefx](https://code.google.com/u/ubeefx/) on January 30, 2012 03:19:51_

What steps will reproduce the problem? Run the deck strength calculator with for instance 100 games. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? This should have no influence on the player history.
However games played and won/lost also count the 100 simulated games. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.22

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=149_
